title: New and planned on Connector 365 Online Help
description: Recent content in New and planned on Connector 365 Online Help

items.title: V1.0.0.8 & Roadmap
items.content_html:
New and planned

Version 1.0.0.8

  • Fix: Negative status if E-Mail Codeunit fails
  • Fix: Write E-Mail related information to joblist

Planned functions for future versions

  • Integration of credit-side documents.
  • Background generation and sending of the documents

items.title: V1.0.0.7 & Roadmap
items.content_html:
New and planned

Version 1.0.0.7

  • Dialog Pages only if allowed (GuiAllowed)

Planned functions for future versions

  • Integration of credit-side documents.
  • Background generation and sending of the documents

items.title: V1.0.0.6 & Roadmap
items.content_html:
New and planned

Version 1.0.0.6

  • Logic when selecting the report layout aligned with the standard

Planned functions for future versions

  • Integration of credit-side documents.
  • Background generation and sending of the documents

items.title: V1.0.0.0 & Roadmap
items.content_html:
New and planned

Version 1.0.0.0

  • Intelligent process control
  • Batch processing of documents
  • Control via document sending profiles

Planned functions for future versions

  • Integration of credit-side documents.
  • Background generation and sending of the documents
